pageContext.claim: “You know, Obama had the same policy on separation … People don’t say it, but Obama had the same law that I did, and they separated parents from their children. I think you guys understand that.”
pageContext.analysis: In fact, families are being separated because of a "zero tolerance" policy from the Trump administration dating to April 2018. No law, whether passed by Democrats or otherwise, requires these separations. During the Obama administration, there may have been some separation if there was suspicion that the children were being trafficked or a claimed parent-child relationship did not actually exist. But nothing like the levels we are seeing today.
